isis.stitle: NEWAY AIR SUSPENSION - MAINTENANCE - 3,000 MILE INSPECTION

step1.para: With vehicle on level surface and full vehicle air pressure, all air springs should be equally inflated and of equal firmness. The height control valve on each side controls the air springs on the same side. Use soap solution and inspect complete system (including valve bodies) for leaks.

Refer to SPECIAL PROCESS WITH "SMART NUTS". Inspect pivot bolt assemblies and axle connections for completeness and fasteners for proper torque. Check all other suspension fasteners for proper torque.

Check ride height adjustment. Suspension ride height (underside of frame to centerline of axle) must be within 1/4" of specified dimension to protect air springs and shock absorbers from overextension.
